benchmark_details.name: CANTTALKABOUT THIS
benchmark_details.overview: The CANTTALKABOUT THIS dataset enables language models to maintain topic relevance in dialogues by including synthetic conversations interspersed with distractor turns designed to divert chatbots from predefined topics.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To improve the ability of language models to maintain topical coherence in conversations.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset is relatively small with a total of 1080 dialogues.

data.source: Synthetic generation using dialogue inpainting techniques.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on model responses to distractors and on-topic turns in the dataset.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in maintaining focus and handling complex instructions.
methodology.baseline_results: Fine-tuned models demonstrated significant improvements over general-purpose models.
